Literature.Title: Enhanced cell selectivity of hybrid peptides with potential antimicrobial activity and immunomodulatory effect.
Literature.Author: Miao X, Zhou T, Zhang J, Xu J, Guo X, Hu H, Zhang X, Hu M, Li J, Yang W, Xie J, Xu Z, Mou L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 8600(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=17µM)
